EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-10-25-App D Follow-up.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Video Demo] Turbonomic + AppD = Self-Managing Data Center Drives App Performance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Great to see you at the Turbonomic booth at AppD Summit! We hope you enjoyed learning about how software can assure performance by managing infrastructure in real-time.
If you missed it, here’s the demo of our latest integration with AppDynamics:
Watch Turbonomic + AppD Demo <[[https://vimeo.com/238472559]]>
Please note that this integration is not generally available yet, but if you’d like to learn more just reply directly to this email with any questions you have.
Best,
The Turbonomic Team
